recipe_name: Prawns with almond and parsley crust
author: James Martin
method: Pre-heat the oven 200C/400F/Gas 6 Mix together the almonds and parsley.   Rub the prawns with the mustard and roll in the mixture. Place on a baking tray in a single layer and cook for 5-6 minutes. Serve warm or cold.
ingredients: 200g/7oz raw tiger prawns,  2 tbsp Dijon mustard,  100g/3Â½ oz toasted flaked almonds, crushed fine,  2 tbsp chopped parsley
